about_the_game:
Sensation! The mad scientist has created a time machine! This device is capable of generating a point in time to which you can return from the future! However, something went wrong... The old timeline is not erased, but a new one is written on top of it, which allows two identical scientists to exist at the same time. It was to be expected that manipulation of time would not do good! The entire scientific complex becomes hostage to a time anomaly, are you able to get out of the time trap ?!



Time of the Clones is a puzzle game where you have to solve riddles relying solely on your logic to complete levels!
Complete levels, move objects, loop the time, do everything so that your clone from the parallel universe will help you get out of the time loop!


Features of the game:
  • Exciting puzzles!
  • Create temporary loops!
  • Hidden places!
  • Hidden objects!
  • Storyline!
  • 7 unique levels!
